body.name: Modefa Turkish Islamic Velvet Prayer Rug - Thin & Lightweight Praying Carpet - Muslim Janamaz Sajadah for Men & Women - Ramadan or Eid Gift - Kufi Cap & Beads - Floral Daisy Arch (Navy Blue)
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 22 mins
features: Modefa Islamic Prayer Rug ---> Available in several beautiful colors, this Muslim prayer mat is part of our Eco Velvet collection -- affordable, decent quality rugs! Amazing praying rug that makes for a good Muslim gifts for men for any special occasion! Also great Islamic gifts for women!

Why We Love It ---> Featuring a soft and velvety geometric floral arched pattern, this incredible Muslim prayer rug is perfect for your everyday needs. Its lightweight design, coupled with its versatility and ease of folding, makes this Turkish janamaz the perfect choice for traveling! The perfect mat for prayer, or a great Islamic gift, Eid gift, or Ramadan gifts!

Thickness Scale ---> 5/10: Our Modefa Thickness Rating on this salah mat is a 5 out of 10. This means it slightly thinner than standard velvet, and we call it "Eco Velvet." You might not want to use this on a hard floor, as it doesn't offer much padding. Great Turkish prayer rug!

Quality You Can Feel ---> Our prayers rug and prayer mats are made in Turkey, so you know it is quality you can trust! For centuries, Turkey has been a renowned producer of Islamic prayer rugs. You can rest easy knowing you pray namaz on a namaz mat that has been ethically produced in Turkish factories -- by Muslims, for Muslims.

Specifications ---> Size: 70 x 110cm (27.6 x 43.3in) | Material: Velvet | Care: Hand wash, line dry for best results. May be washed on gentle cycle, cold, in a washing machine, but be aware that the tassels may come loose. We do not recommend regular washing | Weight: 1.2lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Rug is beautiful but the hat and beads of just extra so they are not of the best quality but good for beginners. I have to be honest about the Rug it's worth the price. I will upgrade later on but will keep as and extra one in case I have friend over to pray along with me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This order is the second from the same place and same product.High quality, right size and color pattern.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The right fit
reviews.reviewText: The packaging was great. I love the color and how the mat was made in full detail. There was no smell in the fibers of the mat. Which can happen due to how the company stores them. I would order this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The is velvety soft to touch. However, the best feature is the brightness of the colors (royal blue and sunny yellow).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just ass advertised
reviews.reviewText: I Like the quality and look of the rug.. The prayer beads and kufi were nice quality as well. I will be doing more business with Modefa in the future Inshallah. Ramadan Mubarak

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very beautiful and it’s great to pray on!!
reviews.reviewText: It’s softness is excellent on carpet, however on a hard floor it will not be as soft, but that’s expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was a gift and the person that received it loved it so much!

reviews.reviewerName: It was great at first but plastic broke on top hinge not even 30 days
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
